mapper.select:
select count(dev.device_name) FROM mon_device_real AS mdr LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON mdr.app_id = dev.app_id LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS equ ON dev.equipment_int = equ.equipment_int
and equ.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and equ.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and dev.device_software_type like '%${deviceSoftwareType}%'
and mdr.device_software_status like '%${deviceSoftwareStatus}%'

SELECT dev.device_id, equ.equipment_int, dev.device_name, dev.device_software_type, mdr.app_id, equ.equipment_id, equ.equipment_name, mdr.device_software_status FROM mon_device_real AS mdr LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON mdr.app_id = dev.app_id LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment AS equ ON dev.equipment_int = equ.equipment_int
and equ.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and equ.equipment_name like '%${equipmentName}%'
and dev.device_name like '%${deviceName}%'
and dev.device_software_type like '%${deviceSoftwareType}%'
and mdr.device_software_status like '%${deviceSoftwareStatus}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
